entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Bridgewater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:32 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 10:00 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -1
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: ENE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning except zero inland.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow. Rain along parts of the coast. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning except zero inland. Forecast issued 8:35 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain or snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 8:35 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 8:35 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High zero. Forecast issued 8:35 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023
